projects.title: Harvest Change Detection
projects.objective: Develop a remote sensing solution to detect monthly cut blocks across BC.
projects.responsibilities: Designed and implemented a multi-temporal change detection workflow, and coordinated internal and external teams for QA/QC to ensure detection accuracy.
projects.tools: Google Earth Engine and Python scripts.
projects.impact: Produced monthly cut block maps from 2020 to 2023, enabling province-wide forest management and informed decision-making.

projects.title: Impact of Marginal Habitats on Canola Yield
projects.objective: Assess the influence of marginal habitats on canola yield.
projects.responsibilities: Designed and implemented machine learning and statistical models to map precise canola yields; evaluated habitat impacts on productivity.
projects.impact: Optimized field design and supported conservation of natural land cover in Alberta.

projects.title: Cropland Expansion Analysis
projects.objective: Evaluate cropland expansion in South Dakota from 2008 to 2018.
projects.responsibilities: Developed and applied time series-based methods to map multi-year land cover and detect long-term crop change from Landsat / Sentinel imagery.
projects.impact: Provided critical insights to support sustainable land management practices.

projects.title: Seismic Lines Assessment
projects.objective: Evaluate vegetation recovery along seismic lines in BC.
projects.responsibilities: Designed and implemented segmentation and clustering process to identify groups of seismic lines with similar recovery status for further manual investigation.
projects.impact: Significantly minimized manual inspection efforts while maintaining high assessment accuracy.
